// TUTORIALS
System

{mood:laugh}Wakey wakey, sleepybones!{break}{mood:laugh}I know it's your last day at home, but that doesn't mean you can skip your chores!{break}{mood:default}Come over here and give your old man a hand.
// Other dialogues
Ossono

So, first off, these crops need harvesting.{break}You could be in for a very long journey out there.{break}After all, you'll get to decide which island you choose to become your new home.{break}{mood:laugh}I don’t want you leaving home empty-handed and hungry!
// NPC quest dialogues
Father
Right then. Roll your sleeves up, and let's get these crops harvested.{break}Oh, and could you also grab that Lilypad on the shore, too?
You were passed out, yes. I carried you... here. You're safe now.{break}But you have to be... more careful... it's dangerous on these islands...
Mother

Let's go over the basics again.{break}Lesson one: Useful plants.{break}{mood:laugh}Remember what I taught you.{break}{mood:default}Flax is good for taming Spirits. That's the one that looks like little purple flowers.{break}Stonefruit, this big round lad, is best for restoring Stamina.{break}{mood:laugh}And Lilypads have healing properties. They taste awful, though!{break}{mood:default}All these plants are spring crops, so keep an eye out for useful plants in other seasons.
{mood:happy}Oh, I've got something for you!
I found you passed out in the fields.{break}Please don't work yourself too hard.
Player

Good job.{break}Lesson two: Harvesting seeds.{break}You'll need seeds to grow more of the same plant.{break}If you want to get seeds, you have to cut down the plant.{break}{mood:laugh}Use your scythe to harvest seeds from any plant - even wild ones!{break}Come over here, and harvest the seeds in this plot.

It's a crafting recipe for a "Sell Crate".{break}Build one and place it wherever you get set up.{break}You can drop anything you want to sell in there, like crops or items.{break}I'll pick it up at the end of the day and pay you for everything that's in there.{break}If you want more recipes, you'll have to find them, I'm afraid...{break}{mood:like}I hear mines and dungeons are a good place to start!
Magic Man
Oh, hold on. Don’t harvest that one!{break}{mood:laugh}Get out your scythe, and cut it down to harvest the seeds.

Oh, one more thing... Can I ask you a quick favor?{break}I also need some stone to rebuild some minor basement damage.{break}{mood:laugh}Don't ask.{break}{mood:like}If you have time, could you bring me some?
The New Year Festival starts at 20:00 tonight in the cave above the Hot Spring!{break}I should definitely attend.
Gaiana
I kinda want to ask, but sure.
The New Year Festival starts in a couple of hours!
Ferra

{mood:laugh}Nicely done.{break}{mood:default}Now, take this hoe, and use it to dig a hole.{break}When you've dug a hole, you can plant those seeds inside it.{break}You can also use the holes that are already here, if you don't want to make new ones, I suppose...
Happy to help!
The Rift Party starts at 20:00 tonight in the tavern!{break}I should definitely attend.
Quill
Perfect.{break}Now, once those seeds are planted, you have to tend to them to help them grow.{break}Here, take this watering can, and give those seeds a drink.
{mood:happy}Thank you! You're a lifesaver.{break}{mood:default}Just put the stones in the sell crate, and I'll pick it up.
The Rift Party starts in a couple of hours in the tavern!
Tobin

Beautifully done.{break}Lesson three. Growing plants.{break}Remember, crops need to be watered EVERY DAY.{break}If not, they'll wither and die, and you'll lose all your hard work!{break}{mood:laugh}Of course, you can always hope for a rainy day to do the job for you.{break}{mood:default}But, stay there a tick... There's something else I want you to have.{break}You see, I’ve been raising three Spirits in secret.{break}They still need plenty more training... but they'll be strong enough to keep you safe.

The Spring Festival is tonight at the hot spring near town.{break}I can show up any time after 20:00, and I should bring a valuable offering for the Spirits.{break}Apparently they like things made with moonstones?
Rowan

You might have seen this before - it's your mother's Medallion.{break}It's a sort of portal to a pocket dimension, where Spirits can reside.{break}This Medallion is yours now, and I've put the Spirits I've been training in there already.{break}Pop into the Medallion, and choose one to have as your companion.{break}{mood:laugh}It isn't a test, don't worry. They're all good.

{mood:happy}Hey, thanks for collecting all those stones for me!{break}{mood:default}The basement's never looked better.{break}Here's a little cash as a thank you.{break}{mood:happy}Unrelatedly, the Dish of the Day today is really good!
The summer festival is tonight, at the beach dock near Tobin's fishing hut.{break}I can show up any time after 20:00, and I don't have to bring anything!
Ofelia
{mood:laugh}Don't leave the Medallion just yet!{break}{mood:default}I want you to choose a Spirit to take with you - it's my gift to you.{break}Plus, you need something to defend yourself out there.
The Cooking Festival is today in the town square!{break}I can turn up any time after 20:00, and I should bring something I cooked.
Paolo
{mood:laugh}Oh!
Zed

{mood:laugh}{tutorial_spirit}!{break}Great choice! I thought you might choose that one.{break}{mood:happy}I'm sure you two will take good care of each other.{break}Don't worry about the other two - your mother and I will take care of them.

{mood:default}There was something else I wanted to ask you.{break}Have you checked out the dungeon yet?{break}Its northeast of town near the Hot Spring.{break}{mood:awkward}None of us have been able to go inside in a while because it's full of wild Spirits...{break}{mood:laugh}But that kinda seems like your thing!{break}{mood:default}I've heard there's treasure and stuff in there too.{break}Go check it out and let me know what you find!
Oh no, I overslept!
Cleo
Oh! Look over there! A wild Spirit!{break}{mood:laugh}This is perfect timing.{break}Get over there and show me what you and your Spirit can do!
Thanks, will do!
Moonstone Mail Co.
Sounds scary. But I'll do it.
// INSANE
Alchemist's Guild
Good luck!
You were passed out, yes. I carried you... here. You're safe now.{break}But you have to be... more careful... it's dangerous on these islands...
The Alchemist
Hello, friend, hello.{break}You are working yourself, too hard, yes.{break}Take your time getting up, take your time.
Zafaran
Looks like this Gemlin has higher Speed than your Spirit, so it gets to make the first move.
{mood:happy}I heard you went to the dungeon and cleared it out!{break}{mood:like}I have spies everywhere. Heh. Thanks for doing that!
Are you okay, yes, yes?{break}Things will get easier, easier, as you learn more...
The Developers

Time for lesson four: Banishing Spirits.{break}You need to subdue these Spirits to pacify them. They're not supposed to be this aggressive.{break}The most important thing to remember: Armor blocks Attack damage.{break}Reduce their Armor to zero to make them Dizzy and deal extra damage.{break}You can reduce Armor in two ways: using a card that removes Armor, or attacking with an element they're weak to.{break}{mood:laugh}Try using Bash to reduce the Gemlin's Armor and leave it open to attack!
Up, up you get. Careful, take care, take care...{break}You passed out, yes... but you are okay.{break}I know how it feels, to feel like a day is not long enough, I know...

Perfect! The bond between you and your Spirit is already strong.{break}{mood:laugh}Don’t forget, if you reduce your opponent's Armor to zero, it will get Dizzy.{break}Being Dizzy makes them miss the next turn, which is your chance to deal more damage.
// SANE
she/her
Now, you’ve got two Energy left, so play two more cards.

{mood:awkward}Alchemist, I am so sorry to use you as hired help, but...{break}{mood:sad}Well, with the wild Spirits running around, it has become too dangerous for us to collect seeds from the outer islands.{break}The shop is suffering as a result... we no longer have the seed diversity that we used to.{break}{mood:default}Since you will be out on the outer islands for your job, do you think you could bring back some of the seeds you find?{break}{mood:like}If you do, we will be able to propagate them and make them available for purchase at the General Store!
I found you passed out in the fields.{break}Please don't work yourself too hard.
he/him
And now, you're all out of Energy!{break}{mood:laugh}End your turn now, and let’s see what this wild Spirit does!
Sure!
Hey, you're up! You were passed out again.{break}I'm worried about you, friend. Don't push yourself to exhaustion!
she/they

Oh dear, that looked like it hurt!{break}Just to be safe, you should heal your spirit.{break}{mood:laugh}Remember I told you that Lilypads were good for healing?{break}Use the Feed action and feed a Lilypad to your Spirit, now.
Fine, I'll do ANOTHER quest...
Are you okay? You're working too hard, yes.{break}Take your time to recover. You can stay as long as you want.
she/her

{mood:laugh}There you go. Your Spirit is looking much healthier!{break}{mood:default}Looks like Gemlin is about to use Earthquake on you, though...{break}With the right moves, you might be able to stop that from happening.
he/him
{mood:default}Now, use another Bash card to bring the Gemlin's armor to 0.{break}Get rid of that Armor, and you'll make them Dizzy so they can’t attack!

{mood:happy}Summer is here!{break}{mood:like}Now that it is a new season, there are new seasonal plants out there on the islands.{break}If you have time, could you collect some more seeds for us and bring them back here?{break}{mood:happy}We can propagate any seeds you bring back and make them available for purchase in the General Store.
he/him

{mood:laugh}Oh, brilliantly done! Nice work.{break}{mood:default}Now you’ve got the upper hand.{break}Damage dealt to a Spirit with no Armor is much higher than usual.{break}{mood:laugh}Bring its HP to zero and banish it to The Great Beyond!
Of course!
Alchemist's Wand: An ancient Alchemist tool which allows the user to rapidly grow plants by spending Stamina.
they/them
You still need MORE seeds?!
Alchemist's Flippers: An ancient Alchemist tool which allows them to traverse bodies of water and swim up waterfalls.
she/her

Great work!{break}One more thing. Lesson four-point-five, I suppose.{break}Spirits can be tamed, and brought into your medallion.{break}Tame a Spirit, and you can use it in future battles.{break}{mood:laugh}Remember to have Flax on hand for taming. Spirits love it!
Alchemist’s Boomerang: An ancient Alchemist tool, used to stun Spirits and harvest seeds at a distance.
they/them
Sweetheart, are you done out there?{break}Come back to the house!{break}{mood:happy}I have something else to give you before you go.

{mood:happy}Fall is here!{break}{mood:like}Now that it is a new season, there are new seasonal plants out there on the islands.{break}If you have time, could you collect some more seeds for us and bring them back here?{break}{mood:happy}We can propagate any seeds you bring back and make them available for purchase in the General Store.
Alchemist’s Teleportation Stone: An ancient Alchemist tool, used to teleport short distances.
he/him
No problem!
she/her
Don't end your turn just yet.{break}You’ve still got Energy left! Try playing another card.
I feel like I should be getting paid for this.
One of four Magical Seals, used in ancient times to seal an interdimensional rift.
Don't run off just yet! You've got the upper hand!{break}I believe in you.
(%% chance of success)

{mood:happy}Winter is here!{break}{mood:like}Now that it is a new season, there are new seasonal plants out there on the islands.{break}If you have time, could you collect some more seeds for us and bring them back here?{break}{mood:happy}We can propagate any seeds you bring back and make them available for purchase in the General Store.
Hmmmm...maybe I should try using the Alchemist’s wand on that ladder plant...
Sure!
Hmmmm...maybe I should try throwing the boomerang at the Mushroom?
TUTORIALS (home and farewell)
Fine, but I'm not gonna enjoy it.
Hmmmm... maybe I should try to teleport to that platform.
Hmmmm...maybe I should try using my new flippers to cross the water.
You look wiped out! Did your father have you banishing Spirits for him?{break}{mood:happy}Of course he did...
I'll make you a cup of tea, you poor thing.{break}{mood:happy}Why don’t you eat one of those Stonefruit you harvested to gain back some of your energy?

That's better.{break}Now that your dad's done with you...{break}{mood:happy}I want to tell you about the Medallion he gave you.{break}The Medallion used to be mine, and now we are passing it down to you.{break}{mood:default}Your Moonstone Medallion is a sacred tool invented by Alchemists that came before us.{break}Within it lies a pocket dimension that can house up to three Spirits.{break}The Spirits you keep in this Medallion will come to your aid should you need help.{break}{mood:happy}You can also build a barn to house them in, which I think is a lot cozier.{break}{mood:default}I know this is all a bit confusing... but you'll get the hang of it.

I guess we should put you to use, Alchemist.{break}Since you're doing all the dangerous island-exploring, that means I don't have to.{break}So if you find any seeds out there, bring them to me.{break}Lina and I can propagate them. And then Rowan will be able to sell seeds in their shop.{break}...That's it. What, you want me to say "please"?

{mood:happy}Looks like that fight you had earlier got you enough experience!{break}Why don't you try levelling up your Spirit? You can do that by entering your Medallion.{break}{mood:default}While you're in there, feed them this Nimbus Plant, too.{break}{mood:sentimental}It’ll make them strong for your journey tonight.
I'll keep an eye out!

{mood:happy}Sweetheart! Hi! It's your mother!{break}I'm calling you through your dreams! I hope that's okay. It's been such a long time since I used oneiromancy.{break}{mood:default}But you haven't been returning our letters! Are you eating well? Are you healthy?
Don't leave just yet!{break}{mood:sentimental}You've got a long journey ahead of you... You should feed the Nimbus Plant to your Spirit first.
Please would be nice, but sure, I'll help.
{mood:laugh}Darling, stop fretting!{break}{mood:default}Kiddo... we got your results last night.{break}...{break}...{break}...{break}{mood:laugh}You did it!
Last call, everyone! The tavern closes in 10 minutes!

{mood:happy}Thank you for doing that.{break}Your father is all about the fighting, but you have to take care of your Spirits too!{break}{mood:default}Now your Spirit should have the strength they need to keep you safe.{break}{mood:sad}I can’t believe you’re leaving home today... I'll miss you so much.{break}{mood:sentimental}But you'll only be gone for a year, right? Then you'll have completed your Alchemy training.{break}I'm so proud of you.
Your father is such a prankster. He did the same when I got my results...
Hey, you gotta leave in ten minutes. I gotta close shop!
{mood:sentimental}Are you sure you’re ready to go?
...You know that there are new seasonal plants in summer, right?{break}That means you have to go out there and find more if you want us to propagate them.{break}Off you go.

We got you something to celebrate your graduation, too!{break}{mood:happy}It's a little magic spell called the Alchemist's Blessing. Your mother has already cast it, so you'll have it when you wake up!{break}{mood:default}It makes wild Spirits friendlier towards you, making them easier to tame!
Just so ye know, shop's closing in ten.
